trans-unit.source: Storage Path: Path for cached files and cloned repositories, absolute (with leading /) or relative to the project root.

Repository Root Path: Root path to repositories, absolute (leading /) or relative to the project root. When adding a new package, the repository is searched in this directory before cloning it. This increases performance and reduces needed disk space.
Disable frontend: If the frontend is disabled, a 404 status code is sent.
Title (e.g. website name): This will be displayed inside the header and the footer of the frontend view.
Description: This will be displayed inside the footer of the frontend view.
Name (e.g. company name): This will be displayed inside the footer of the frontend view.
Homepage (e.g. your company's homepage): This will be linked inside the footer of the frontend view.
Copyright notice: This will be added to the copyright year in the frontend.
